§ 1964. Report to Congress The President shall whenever appropriate report to the Congress his action hereunder. (Pub. L. 85–7, § 5, Mar. 9, 1957, 71 Stat. 6; Pub. L. 87–195, pt. IV, § 705, Sept. 4, 1961, 75 Stat. 463.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1961—Pub. L. 87–195 substituted “whenever appropriate” for “within the months of January and July of each year”.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries RepealsSection 705 of Pub. L. 87–195, cited as a credit to this section, was repealed by section 401 of Pub. L. 87–565, pt. IV, Aug. 1, 1962, 76 Stat. 263, except insofar as section 705 affected this section.
